bll

Class ProductBLL

  • java.lang.Object
    • bll.ProductBLL

  • public class ProductBLL
extends java.lang.Object
    Business Logic class for the Product table, implementing methods used to further enhance the usage of the SQL queries

      • insertProduct

        public int insertProduct(java.lang.String name,
                         int quantity,
                         float price)
        method used to insert a product in the database if the product exists, it will update the existing product
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the name of the product to be inserted
        quantity - int representing the quantity of the product
        price - float representing the price of the product
        Returns:
        -1 if the client already exists, 1 if it does not

      • deleteProductByFlag

        public void deleteProductByFlag(java.lang.String name)
        method to apparently delete a product from the database does not truly delete the product, but it changes the "deleted" flag from 0 to 1
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product to be deleted from the database
